alert.note: Alert for Blue Earth; Faribault; Martin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 13 at 7:00AM CDT until June 13 at 7:45AM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Twin Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Faribault County in south central Minnesota... Northeastern Martin County in south central Minnesota... Southeastern Blue Earth County in south central Minnesota... * Until 745 AM CDT. * At 659 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Winnebago, or 16 miles northeast of Fairmont, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Amboy around 710 AM CDT. Delavan around 715 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Mapleton and Minnesota Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
